languages.text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.
languages.original_text:
Один раз за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа с мира смерти опускается ниже 30%, он получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Персонаж с мира смерти также получает бонус +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и броне, когда у него есть хотя бы 1 временное здоровье, полученное любым способом.

traits.locale_text:
Once per combat, when the wounds of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their maximum wounds as temporary wounds.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to dodge and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

languages.text:
Einmal pro Kampf, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Todesweltcharakters unter 30 % fallen, erhält er +20 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
Todesweltcharaktere erhalten außerdem einen Bonus von +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und Rüstung, solange sie mindestens 1 temporäre Wunde von irgendeiner Quelle haben.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
Einmal pro Kampf, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Todesweltcharakters unter 30% fallen, erhält er +20% seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
Todesweltcharaktere erhalten außerdem einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20% auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}, solange sie mindestens 1 temporäre Wunde von irgendeiner Quelle haben.

languages.text:
Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un personnage d'un monde hostile passe sous la barre des 30 %, il obtient un bonus de +20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
Les personnages des mondes hostiles reçoivent également un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et d'armure de +20 %, à condition d'avoir au moins 1 blessure temporaire, quelle qu'en soit la source.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un personnage d'un monde hostile passe sous la barre des 30 %, il obtient un bonus de +20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
Les personnages des mondes hostiles reçoivent également un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et d'armure de +20 %, à condition d'avoir au moins 1 blessure temporaire, quelle qu'en soit la source.

languages.text:
每场战斗中，当来自死亡世界的角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次低于30%时，该角色会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的20%。
只要来自死亡世界的角色至少有1点临时生命值（任何来源均可），该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}和护甲就会获得20%加值。
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
每场战斗中，当来自死亡世界的角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次低于30%时，该角色会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的20%。
只要来自死亡世界的角色至少有1点临时生命值（任何来源均可），该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}就会获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

每场战斗中，当来自死亡世界的角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次低于30%时，该角色会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的20%。
只要来自死亡世界的角色至少有1点临时生命值（任何来源均可），该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}就会获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

languages.text:
Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje de un mundo letal bajan del 30 %, reciben un +20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
Los personajes de mundos letales también reciben una bonificación de +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y armadura mientras tengan al menos 1 herida temporal de cualquier origen.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje de un mundo letal bajan del 30 %, reciben un +20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
Los personajes de mundos letales también reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} mientras tengan al menos 1 herida temporal de cualquier origen.

languages.text:
戦闘ごとに一度、死地惑星のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が30%以下になった時、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の20%分を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として得る。
死地惑星のキャラクターは、いずれかの発生源により1以上の一時体力を持っている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}とアーマーに+20%のボーナスを得る。
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘ごとに一度、死地惑星のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が30%以下になった時、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の20%分を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として得る。
死地惑星のキャラクターは、いずれかの発生源により1以上の一時体力を持っている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text:
Один раз за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа с мира смерти опускается ниже 30%, он получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Персонаж с мира смерти также получает бонус +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и броне, когда у него есть хотя бы 1 временное здоровье, полученное любым способом.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.

traits.locale_text:
Один раз за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа из мира смерти опускается ниже 30%, он получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Персонаж из мира смерти также получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}, когда у него есть хотя бы 1 временное здоровье, полученное любым способом.

Один раз за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа из мира смерти опускается ниже 30%, он получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Персонаж из мира смерти также получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g}, когда у него есть хотя бы 1 временное здоровье, полученное любым способом.

languages.text:
Bir ölüm dünyası karakteri, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %30'un altına inerse çatışmada bir kez {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının +%20'si kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} kazanır.
Ayrıca ölüm dünyası karakterleri, herhangi bir kaynaktan en az 1 geçici sağlık puanına sahiplerse {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerlerine +%20 bonus alırlar.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat, when the {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} of a death world character drop below 30%, they gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
Death world characters also gain a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and armour while they have at least 1 temporary wound from any source.
